pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Imputation for Interval Censored Data // Implements multiple imputation for proportional hazards regression with interval censored data or proportional sub-distribution hazards regression for interval censored competing risks data. The main functions allow to estimate survival function, cumulative incidence function, Cox and Fine Gray regression coefficients and associated variance-covariance matrix. 'MIICD' functions call 'Surv', 'survfit' and 'coxph' from the 'survival' package, 'crprep' from the 'mstate' package, and 'mvrnorm' from the 'MASS' package.
